name: Elizabeth Medina
coverLetter: I have a cousin who works in this industry. During trimming season he recruits several people to work for him. Sadly I've only got the opportunity to work with him once, due to my busy schedule. Recently I got laid off my full time job and I'm interesting in a part time job as a trimmer. I am a responsible, fast learner, detailed, trustworthy, hard working person. I hope hearing back from you guys soon.
